AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.heroDescription: Kenan Kadıoğlu Real Estate is a real estate consultancy company providing reliable, transparent and professional services in Trabzon and its surroundings with 15 years of industry experience.
AboutPage.contentDescription1: Since the day we were founded; we produce the most suitable solutions for our customers' needs with the principles of right investment, right valuation and right communication.
AboutPage.contentDescription2: While our portfolio includes residential, land, commercial real estate and investment projects; we serve each customer with a special analysis, accurate pricing and result-oriented working model.
